summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Twenty-fourth Avenue and Twenty-fourth Avenue produced north, from East Alder Street to East Cherry Street in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers under Ordinance No. 14968, creating Local Improvement District No. 1322 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
